mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, email, user_exp, submit, solved, blog_cnt, defunct, ip, accesstime, volume, `language`, `password`, reg_time, nick, school, sign) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userExp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{solved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defunct,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accesstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sign,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_exp = #{userExp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submit = #{submit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, solved = #{solved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blog_cnt = #{blogCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, defunct = #{defunct,jdbcType=CHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accesstime = #{accesstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `language` = #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nick = #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign = #{sign,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, email, user_exp, submit, solved, blog_cnt, defunct, ip, accesstime, volume, `language`, `password`, reg_time, nick, school, sign from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_id, email, user_exp, submit, solved, blog_cnt, defunct, ip, accesstime, volume, `language`, `password`, reg_time, nick, school, sign from user
